mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ad_dsp( dsp_id, dsp_name, corp_name, home_page, email, contact_person, post_address, `type`, account_flag, token, ebs_customer_id ) VALUES ( #{dspId}, #{dspName}, #{corpName}, #{homePage}, #{email}, #{contactPerson}, #{postAddress}, #{type}, #{accountFlag}, #{token}, #{ebsCustomerId} )
mapper.select: SELECT dsp.id AS id, dsp.dsp_id AS dspId, dsp.dsp_name AS dspName,dsp.corp_name AS corpName,dsp.home_page AS homePage, dsp.email AS email,dsp.contact_person AS contactPerson,dsp.post_address AS postAddress,dsp.type AS type, dsp.account_flag AS accountFlag,dsp.token AS token,dsp.ebs_customer_id AS ebsCustomerId FROM ad_dsp AS dsp WHERE dsp.dsp_id = #{dspId}
